title: Creative Pedagogical Design for Sustainable STEAM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and understanding of pedagogy
context.additional_context: Pre-service and in-service teachers develop sustainable STEAM education models addressing local socio-environmental issues. The program strengthens creative problem-solving competencies using digital/non-digital technologies (biomaterials, recycled filaments, AR, etc.)

learning_goals: Design and implementation plan for sustainable STEAM projects addressing local socio-environmental issues
Cultivation of competency in developing teaching-learning materials that integrate design thinking and inquiry-based learning
Assessment of 21st-century competencies (critical thinking, collaboration) during collaborative problem-solving processes using digital/non-digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
